help.comment:
Net::IMAP::BodyTypeMessage represents MESSAGE/RFC822 body structures of messages.

Fields:

  • Returns a Net::IMAP::Envelope giving the envelope structure.
  • Returns an object giving the body structure.

And Net::IMAP::BodyTypeMessage has all methods of Net::IMAP::BodyTypeText.

methods.method: Obsolete: use subtype instead. Calling this will generate a warning message to stderr, then return the value of subtype.
